Need more help?

If you don't see what you are looking for, here are some more support services to help.

  • Help Center

    This is a library of written and visual resources, covering a wide range of topics.

    Visit our help center

  • Support Team

    Our Support Team is available from 12 AM to 5 PM (Pacific time), Monday through Friday. Contact them via the intercom button on the bottom right of the screen.

  • Events

    We regularly run learning events for all levels of ability - from beginner to advanced.

    Visit our Events page
